tips: The distance formula is based on the Pythagorean theorem: a² + b² = c²
Order of points doesn't matter - distance from A to B equals distance from B to A
The formula works for any two points, regardless of their position on the coordinate plane
Negative coordinates follow the same formula - just be careful with the subtraction
For horizontal or vertical lines, one of the differences will be zero, simplifying the calculation
The result is always positive since we're calculating a distance (length)
